Pre-Game Insights: The Cavaliers are 20-4 in conference matchups.
Cleveland ranks sixth in the Eastern Conference with 16.0 fast break points per game led by Donovan Mitchell averaging 3.6.
Charlotte is 6-23 in Eastern Conference play.
Charlotte averages 12.8 offensive rebounds per game led by Moussa Diabate averaging 3.1.
The Cavaliers average 16.4 made 3-pointers per game, while the Hornets allow 13.7 per game. The Hornets average 14.3 made 3-pointers per game, while the Cavaliers allow 13.3 per game.
Mitchell is averaging 23.4 points, 4.7 assists and 1.5 steals for the Cavaliers.
LaMelo Ball is scoring 30.1 points per game with 5.3 rebounds and 7.5 assists for the Hornets.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Cavaliers have won 9 out of their last 10 games, averaging 125.0 points, 45.1 rebounds, 31.4 assists, 8.8 steals and 4.4 blocks per game while shooting 49.5% from the field.
The Hornets have lost 9 out of their last 10 games, averaging 103.5 points, 47.2 rebounds, 25.0 assists, 8.8 steals and 4.9 blocks per game while shooting 42.6% from the field.

Injury updates: Cavaliers - Sam Merrill: day to day (ankle), Isaac Okoro: out (shoulder). Hornets - Brandon Miller: day to day (ankle), Grant Williams: out for season (ACL), DaQuan Jeffries: day to day (groin), LaMelo Ball: day to day (wrist), Tre Mann: out (back).
